COLLECTIONS.TITLE: Collections
COLLECTIONS.ERROR_DELETE: An error occurred while deleting the collection.
COLLECTIONS.ENTER_NAME: Please enter a name for this collection.
COLLECTIONS.ORDER_ELEMENTS: Would you like to change the order of the objects manually?
COLLECTIONS.ORDER_ELEMENTS_INFO: Viewers of the collection see the contained materials in a certain order.
COLLECTIONS.ORDER_SAVED: The object order has been changed.

TAB.EDU_GROUPS_LONG: collections that have been shared by or with you.
TAB.EDU_ALL_LONG: all collections that are available to you

CREATE.PRIVATE_DESCRIPTION: Nobody but you can see the collection. You can always share or publish the collection with others later.
CREATE.SHARED_DESCRIPTION: Collect together with friends and colleagues. You can determine who is allowed to do what with the collection.
CREATE.PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: Create a public collection and show the world your most beautiful content.
CREATE.EDITORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Here an editorial group takes care of the collection and maintains its contents. Collections can be pinned to a certain position.
CREATE.CURRICULUM_DESCRIPTION: Create a (moderated) collection according to predefined curriculum structures.

PINNING.TITLE: pinned collections
PINNING.UPDATED: The list of pinned collections has been updated.

COLLECTIONS.NO_ADD_PERMISSIONS: You have insufficient permissions to add materials to this collection
COLLECTIONS.ERROR_NODE_EXISTS: The collection already contains this element
COLLECTIONS.ADDED_TO_COLLECTION: Element was saved in additional collection
COLLECTIONS.EDIT_PERMISSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Invite persons or groups and collect together.
COLLECTIONS.PERMISSIONS_STATUS_MY: This collection is currently only visible for you
COLLECTIONS.PERMISSIONS_STATUS_CUSTOM: This collection is shared with invited members
COLLECTIONS.ORIGINAL_MISSING_INFO: The original has been deleted and can not be accessed anymore. You can open the reference to view the metadata.
COLLECTIONS.CONFIRM_DELETE: Do you really want to delete the collection?
COLLECTIONS.CONFIRM_DELETE_INFO: Do you really want to delete the collection? This can take some time for folders with lots of subordinate objects.
COLLECTIONS.REMOVED_FROM_COLLECTION: The element(s) have been removed from the collection
COLLECTIONS.EXTENDED_PERMISSIONS: Individual persons or groups (view, collaborate or coordinate)

TOAST.DUPLICATE_NAME: A collection with the same name already exists
TOAST.INVALID_NAME: The given name is invalid. Please don't use special characters

collections_noOrgaCollections: Your groups have not shared any collections yet.
collections_noCollections: There are no public collections available yet.
collections_howToAddContent: Just click on the "ADD MATERIAL" button and use the search engine to find contents for your collection.
